title: Miley Cyrus and Cody Simpson look as loved up as ever on date night
text:
Miley and Cody looked loved up as they strolled through the Halloween attraction together (Picture: X17)

Miley Cyrus and Cody Simpson looked loved up rather than terrified as they checked out a Halloween event over the weekend.

The couple couldn’t keep their hands off each other as they headed to Universal Studios Hollywood’s Halloween Horror Nights on one of their first dates since Cody returned from his native Australia.

Miley couldn’t wipe the smile off her face to have her man back in Los Angeles as they headed around the theme park with their arms around each other.

The theme park boasts attractions like The Walking Dead walk-through maze as well as a Stranger Things attraction but these two only had eyes for themselves.

Cody looked fresh faced despite having just flown in from Sydney, Australia, where sources claimed to hear him complain about a row with Miley as he lounged by the pool.

Advertisement

The source claimed to the Daily Mail that Cody had said: ‘We had a weird one yesterday… not really an argument but she kind of shut down. Yeah, it was kind of s**tty, but whatever.

‘I’m copping s**t here because of [her] exes. You know, her husband is Australian.’

Miley couldn’t stop grinning at being reunited with Cody after his trip to Australia (Picture: X17)

However there were no signs of an argument once the pair had reunited, as they continued to put on some serious PDA – and we’d expect nothing less based on what they’ve been serving for the past couple of weeks.

The pair have been friends for years but only got together at the start of October after Miley called off her six-week romance with Kaitlynn Carter.

Miley and Kaitlynn’s brief fling came as she announced the end of her marriage to Liam Hemsworth just eight months after they tied the knot.

Cody had previously dated model Claire Wuestenberg, Gigi Hadid and Kylie Jenner way back in 2012.
